title: Iskra Lawrence exposes her cleavage in plunging black jumpsuit
text:
Fashion took precedence on Monday evening as Iskra Lawrence made an appearance at a cocktail party in New York City.

The British model, 29, commanded attention in an elegant sleeveless jumpsuit while making her way into the soiree, hosted by the Council of Fashion Designers of America (CFDA).

With a plunging front, the stylish outfit fully exposed Iskra's cleavage, while its fitted cut served to accentuate her voluptuous curves.

Looking good: Fashion took precedence on Monday evening as Iskra Lawrence made an appearance at a cocktail party in New York City

The model added to her look with a pair of embellished sheer heels, and they inevitably caught the eye as she greeted onlookers before making her way inside.

A tasteful grey handbag gave an otherwise subdued colour scheme an added splash of vibrancy, while gold hoop earrings rounded things off.

Drawing further attention to her naturally pretty features, Iskra opted for deft touches of make-up selected from a soft palette.

The British model, 29, commanded attention in an elegant sleeveless jumpsuit while making her way into the soiree, hosted by the Council of Fashion Designers of America

Finishing touches: The model added to her look with a pair of embellished sheer heels, and they inevitably caught the eye as she greeted onlookers before making her way inside

The model was stepping out received an honorary gold medal from Trinity College Dublin's University Philosophical Society last week.

Iskra was invited by the university society to speak on her career in the fashion industry as well as breaking the mold as a body-confident model.

The beauty's body positive outlook has won her legions of fans and she currently boasts 4.5million followers on Instagram.

Well done: The model was stepping out received an honorary gold medal from Trinity College Dublin's University Philosophical Society last week

Her popularity also prompted Glamour to name her one of the new 'shakers' in the modelling industry alongside Alessandra Garcia-Lorido, Yvonne Simone, Solange van Doorn and Seynabou Cissé.

Speaking to the publication, the model admitted her regret that plus-size women were often more further sexualised than others.

She also expressed that body positivity campaigns still tended to cater to the smaller end of the plus-size spectrum.

'I can’t promise you that you’re [always] going to feel represented...So I want people to know if you can’t see yourself, you can still be it, you can still do it,' she said

Iskra was born in Worcestershire, UK, and was accepted into the National Youth Theatre at the young age of 15, she was also a competitive swimmer on the national level at the same age.
description: The British model, 29, commanded attention in an elegant sleeveless jumpsuit while making her way into the soiree, hosted by the Council of Fashion Designers of America.
